CustomField.description: This field must be populated when the win type is Auto-Renewal with the previously signed quote containing the AR clause.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In order to Auto-Renew we must have a previous signed contract/quote with an AR clause. Please provide a link to it. If attached to an opportunity (could be a previous opportunity), copy the salesforce document URL and paste in this field. e.g. https://trilogy-sales.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/ContentDocument/0692x00000CD3PAAA1/view
CustomField.label: Previously Signed Quote with AR Clause
